snippet: The winner of this year’s Sidney H. Lazard Jr. Award for Sportsmanship from the American Contract Bridge League is Michael Kamil of Holmdel, N.J.

lead_paragraph: The winner of this year’s Sidney H. Lazard Jr. Award for Sportsmanship from the American Contract Bridge League is Michael Kamil of Holmdel, N.J.

headline.seo: Bridge — Michael Kamil Wins Lazard Award
